items.name: Museo Francisco Villa
items.address: Av. 5 de Febrero 800, Zona Centro, 34000 Durango, Dgo.
items.description: This museum, housed in a 19th-century building, celebrates the life of Mexican revolutionary Pancho Villa with exhibits of his personal belongings, photographs, and historic artifacts.

items.name: Catedral Basílica Menor de Durango
items.address: Calle Constitución 200, Zona Centro, 34000 Durango, Dgo.
items.description: A stunning example of baroque architecture, the Durango Cathedral is one of the city's most recognizable landmarks, featuring ornate gold interiors and impressive frescoes.

items.name: Teleférico de Durango
items.address: Cerro del Calvario, Zona Centro, 34000 Durango, Dgo.
items.description: The Durango Cable Car offers panoramic views of the historic downtown area and surrounding mountains, providing a unique perspective of the city.

items.name: Parque Guadiana
items.address: Av. Heroico Colegio Militar S/N, Col. Los Angeles, 34100 Durango, Dgo.
items.description: Durango’s largest public park, perfect for jogging, picnics, and family activities, featuring fountains, bike paths, and a small lake with pedal boats.

items.name: Calle Constitución
items.address: Calle Constitución, Zona Centro, 34000 Durango, Dgo.
items.description: A lively pedestrian street filled with cafes, local shops, and colonial-era architecture, ideal for evening walks and local shopping.

items.name: Túnel de Minería
items.address: Calle Bruno Martínez s/n, Zona Centro, 34000 Durango, Dgo.
items.description: An underground museum that recreates Durango’s mining history, allowing visitors to walk through realistic tunnels and learn about the state’s silver and gold mining heritage.

items.name: El Salto Waterfalls
items.address: El Salto, Pueblo Nuevo, Durango, Dgo.
items.description: Located about 2 hours from Durango city, these breathtaking waterfalls surrounded by pine forests are a popular spot for hiking and nature photography.

items.name: Old West Movie Set (Parque Temático Paseo del Viejo Oeste)
items.address: Km 12 Carretera a Parral, Durango, Dgo.
items.description: A themed park built on the filming location of many classic Western movies, where visitors can explore movie sets and enjoy cowboy reenactments.
